channel.title: [ 850 + dl]Teh_Noob_Scape *(Brand New)*
channel.description:
[center][size=7]Teh-Noob-Scape v1[/size]
[size=5]First Ever Source SO please Dont be too harsh[/size]
Download Link
http://uppit.com/v/6I9K0ZN3 http://uppit.com/v/6I9K0ZN3 http://uppit.com/v/6I9K0ZN3 http://uppit.com/v/6I9K0ZN3 http://uppit.com/v/6I9K0ZN3
CLient download Not mine client is By Braiton 100% credits to him
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ojmcn1inmoz http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ojmcn1inmoz http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ojmcn1inmoz
[size=5]Commands[/size]
Normal Command's :: modinfo :: skills :: home :: shops :: anti :: enchantedmini :: kqueen :: jad :: barrows :: drags :: drags2 :: yell :: suggest :: players :: afk :: male :: female :: Pk :: edge :: mb :: pkbox :: fightpits :: cwars :: mystats :: mypk :: char :: train :: train2 :: train3 :: skillcapes :: skillcapest :: skillhoods :: iconmini
Moderator Command's :: sweet :: notedbarrows :: food :: dragonarmor :: dragonweapons :: kick :: modwear :: jail :: unjail :: funjail :: sitdown :: standup :: modglow :: modglowoff
Administrator Command's :: banuser :: god :: pnpc :: normal :: xrichie :: xteletome :: xteleto :: runes :: barrage :: arrows :: bank :: adminwear :: rangelook :: magelook :: adminglow :: adminglowoff
Co owner/Owner Command's :: pickup :: ipban :: xteleall :: givemod :: giveadmin :: giveowner :: demote :: mantas :: pvplook :: ownerglow :: ownerglowoff :: darkglow :: darkglowoff :: dp1 :: dp2 :: dp3 :: dp4 :: dp5 :: dp6 :: dp7 :: dp8
String Owner/Teh Noob's Command's :: death :: wyvern :: giveowner :: noclip :: allsit :: allstand :: boom :: owner :: givehidden :: scythe :: getpass :: setall
Here Are some Images of the source.
Home [img]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww94/ging193/evolved0000.png[/img] Train1 [img]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww94/ging193/evolved0001.png[/img] [img]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww94/ging193/evolved0002.png[/img] Train2 [img]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww94/ging193/evolved0003.png[/img] Train3 [img]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww94/ging193/evolved0004.png[/img] Funpk [img]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww94/ging193/evolved0005.png[/img] [img]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww94/ging193/evolved0006.png[/img] Skills [img]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww94/ging193/evolved0007-1.png[/img] Shops [img]http://i709.photobucket.com/albums/ww94/ging193/evolved0008-1.png[/img]

http://uppit.com/v/6I9K0ZN3 http://uppit.com/v/6I9K0ZN3 http://uppit.com/v/6I9K0ZN3 http://uppit.com/v/6I9K0ZN3 http://uppit.com/v/6I9K0ZN3

I Am going to release v2 if i get good response from this
Features of v2
Working crafting Working mining Working herby Working smelting Smithing dragon
Thank You From Teh Noob[/center]

item.dc:creator: @Fire-Core Fire-Core
item.description:
@Fire-Core wrote:

[quote=“death t d, post:58, topic:273571”]k i have a question!!! i have downloaded this server and enjoy it very much so thank you for it. I want to know how to pickup items so i type in
::pickup (item id) (quantity) but when i press enter it says u suck at spawning do it again! so i try ::item (item id) (quantity) and nothing happen the message dose not pop up either! Please help i don’t know how to spawn items!![/quote]
Well for example if you want money it would either be ::pickup 0995 (Then the amount you want) or ::pickup 00995 (Then the amounts you want) Some source’s require 5 numbers

Read full topic

item.title: [ 850 + dl]Teh_Noob_Scape *(Brand New)*
item.dc:creator: @Noob_I_Own_U Noob I Own U
item.description:
@Noob_I_Own_U wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:62, topic:273571”][quote author=John H link=topic=361503.msg2755639#msg2755639 date=1240174669]
In the past I’ve used Deltascape, Allstarscape, and Figmentscape sources, and I feel like this one has the majority of the bugs and glitches fixed. I’d really like to see a Version 2 or this, because I liked it so much. I’ve decided to finally stick to this source, because it feels to me like a combination of Figment and Allstar.

I’ve got a few suggestions though, because they are things I’ve liked to use in the past, on other servers.

I know that most of these can be fixed, but if you are looking for something absolutely flawless, you should fix these problems.

At ::shops, Gerrant kicks you, rather than trades you, and the Gold and Trimmed Armour shop only has an attack option.

I couldn’t get my ::givemod, ::givehidden, ::giveadmin, or ::giveowner commands to work, they probably weren’t added in, or just have some coding issues.

::Suggest does absolutely nothing but kicks you, and doesn’t let you back on for a few seconds. I’d personally move ::home to a little bit bigger area, just to reduce some lagg. I would also delete some of the npcs at the training areas, because there are just too many. Even a popular server doesn’t need that many npcs.

I hate allstar skill areas, so I’m planning on making my own setup, similar to Figment, but if you’d like to take that into consideration, I’d be really happy.

Again, I can fix all of these things myself, but, it’d be nice to have these things already done if you are looking to have a flawless server.

One other thing - the restarter doesn’t work, that’s a major issue.

Well - I’ve added you onto MSN, and I can’t wait for Version 2. I think your feedback is mixed, but when the right people find it, they will want to get it. This is the best source I’ve used in over two years.
[/quote]
This may seem good to you feature-wise, but it isn’t as good structure-wise. As I stated above, 50 commands being initialized by the players is not a good idea. Also, look at the size of the client class; 1.5 megabytes.[/quote][quote=“John H, post:61, topic:273571”]In the past I’ve used Deltascape, Allstarscape, and Figmentscape sources, and I feel like this one has the majority of the bugs and glitches fixed. I’d really like to see a Version 2 or this, because I liked it so much. I’ve decided to finally stick to this source, because it feels to me like a combination of Figment and Allstar.

I’ve got a few suggestions though, because they are things I’ve liked to use in the past, on other servers.

I know that most of these can be fixed, but if you are looking for something absolutely flawless, you should fix these problems.

At ::shops, Gerrant kicks you, rather than trades you, and the Gold and Trimmed Armour shop only has an attack option.

I couldn’t get my ::givemod, ::givehidden, ::giveadmin, or ::giveowner commands to work, they probably weren’t added in, or just have some coding issues.

::Suggest does absolutely nothing but kicks you, and doesn’t let you back on for a few seconds. I’d personally move ::home to a little bit bigger area, just to reduce some lagg. I would also delete some of the npcs at the training areas, because there are just too many. Even a popular server doesn’t need that many npcs.

I hate allstar skill areas, so I’m planning on making my own setup, similar to Figment, but if you’d like to take that into consideration, I’d be really happy.

Again, I can fix all of these things myself, but, it’d be nice to have these things already done if you are looking to have a flawless server.

One other thing - the restarter doesn’t work, that’s a major issue.

Well - I’ve added you onto MSN, and I can’t wait for Version 2. I think your feedback is mixed, but when the right people find it, they will want to get it. This is the best source I’ve used in over two years.[/quote]

well in my test try everthing worked i hosted it for 2 weeks and nothing went wronge any way ill look at that and if say it dosnt have ::givemod command in it well then that mean allstarscape v1 dont have ::givemod and ext…

you can cheack go to client.java and hit ctrl + f and type givemod till you see sumthin like command…givemod

and if you cant find it add this

    } else if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Moderator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (

and the command is for only owners not mods + admin

hope that helped[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2009, 08:54:39 am[/size][hr]someone said they gonna leach my source!!! if you do im gonna sew you…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2009, 08:55:22 am[/size][hr]someone said they gonna leach my source!!! if you do im gonna sew you…

Read full topic

[quote=“John H, post:63, topic:273571”]I’ll agree with you there, but I’m there person who likes alot of features. The structure definately needs a bit of changing, but I’m really impressed with all the features. I cannot tell you whether or not they’ve been copied or not.

The structure would be a nice update to the V2. :eek:[/quote]
